Text: CHILD SOLDIERS  The first transfer reportedly occurred on December 15, 2009, when pre-independence Southern Sudan's Ministry of Finance paid $65 million to Uganda-registered Cascade Construction as payment for a mobile system for aviation management and monitoring central unit, complete with radar and other equipment.
Cause: payment for a mobile system for aviation management and monitoring central unit, complete with radar and other equipment.
Effect: CHILD SOLDIERS  The first transfer reportedly occurred on December 15, 2009, when pre-independence Southern Sudan's Ministry of Finance paid $65 million to Uganda-registered Cascade Construction
